constituent: cram school, receive, tall, top hat, mouth, child, children, round, nine, baseball, drop, soil, dirt, ground
heisigStory: Cram schools are after-hours educational institutions where kids can do concentrated preparing for their coming entrance examinations or drill what they missed during regular class hours. The exception are the tall children who are out on the school grounds practicing sports, and the fat ones who are out there burning off calories. So this character depicts those who do NOT go to the cram schools, rather than those who do.
koohiiStory1: Welcome to our cram school: you will receive a rounded education on our grounds.
koohiiStory2: You can receive a well-rounded education if you study at our cram school says the advertisement. "Just come to our school grounds and check it out yourself!".
myStory: trường tư. nơi nhận làm tròn trên đất là trường tư
words: 塾(じゅく): coaching school, lessons
